The wrapper implements the InputStream API. The idea is that can use=

read(), etc. on a wrapper instance. For instance we pass these
directly in=
to Tika for processing.

The key is getting the headers parsed (if you need=
 them) and getting
the record cue=E2=80=99d up to where the HTTP response b=
ody begins. This is
basically what the wrapper does.

I hope that makes sen=
se!
